issue.title: Joomla 3.7 : "file" field type has changed layout, breaks diffusion view
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

in Joomla 3.7, the "file":https://docs.joomla.org/File_form_field_type/en field type has changed layout, it now displays the max upload size in a new line.
This breaks a little layout of our 'diffusion' view, the current file is displayed after the size phrase.
I propose to split the field: 
- one "current file" with the link, only displayed if a file exists
- one "new file" to upload data file

Now with Joomla 3.7 :

!before.png!

!after.png!
